outputs.output_descr: Strengthened cooperation between Bappenas and UNDP in UNDP regarding programming, implementation and monitoring and evaluation procedures.
Improved policy and regulatory framework concerning aid  management contributing to development effectiveness

Under this component, ECBAM will provide support to strengthening functional capacities of the Government at the decentralized level and feed successful practices and lessons into the national dialogue and action within the operational framework of the Roadmap implementation. The project will help inform and foster the nationally-owned approaches to better integrate capacity development into key development plans and strategies at the central and local level.

Through this component, ECBAM will continue to be a flexible facility for preparation of UNDP assisted programs or projects by providing support from assessment and conceptual stage to initiation stage as necessary.

project_title: enhancing capacity for better aid management
